title: Can't login with correct user name and password
body: Can't log into the alpha client. It says incorrect username or password, yet the same details work fine in the legacy client. Have been in alpha client testing for a few months, it was working, but not now :(

replies.body: Riot, please help me. I still can't login. I originally lodged a support ticket and they told me to post on here.
Hey twoHeadedFreak - what do you see when you try to log in? What's the error message? There's been a couple other reports of players being unable to log into the alpha client.

Disregard, you said you solved it. nice job I'm out

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/2013/11/creeper.gif

(I'll also pass along the feedback about regions being visible at all times)

Solved it myself. Turns out the alpha client was changing my server on me (it did it a few times on Monday night). Would be great if the alpha client displayed the server that you're trying to log into (without having to click on language /region) so this sort of thing would be obvious.
